trans-unit.source: Provides the basic functionality for a remoting activator class.
trans-unit.target: 提供遠端啟動項 (Activator) 類別的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: Activators control and participate in the activation of marshal by reference objects.
trans-unit.target: 已控制，並參與參考物件的封送處理啟用。

trans-unit.source: Some activators create contexts, whereas others create actual objects.
trans-unit.target: 某些已建立的內容，而其他人建立實際的物件。

trans-unit.source: Activators use the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IActivator.NextActivator%2A> property to form a hierarchy that must be observed.
trans-unit.target: 已使用<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IActivator.NextActivator%2A>屬性，以形成，必須遵守的階層。

trans-unit.source: The information about the object that is needed to activate it, stored in a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage" />.
trans-unit.target: 有關啟動它所需物件的相關資訊，儲存在 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the object that is specified in the provided <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件的執行個體，此物件是在所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionCallMessage" /> 中指定。

trans-unit.source: Status of the object activation contained in a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IConstructionReturnMessage" /> 中所包含物件啟動過程的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構使用權限。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel" /> where this activator is active.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個啟動項在作用中的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel" /> where this activator is active.
trans-unit.target: 這個啟動項在作用中的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.ActivatorLevel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IActivator.Level%2A> is used to locate the right position in the chain when adding an activator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.IActivator.Level%2A>用來尋找鏈結中的正確位置，新增啟動時。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the next activator in the chain.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定鏈結中的下一個啟動項。

trans-unit.source: The next activator in the chain.
trans-unit.target: 鏈結中的下一個啟動項。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構使用權限。

trans-unit.source: For operating with infrastructure code.
trans-unit.target: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />
